verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I, the Lord of sea and sky, I have heard my people cry. All who dwell in dark and sin My hand will save. I, who made the stars of night, I will make their darkness bright. Who will bear My light to them? Whom shall I send?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here I am, Lord. Is it I, Lord? I have heard You calling in the night. I will go, Lord, if You lead me. I will hold Your people in my heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I, the Lord of snow and rain, I have borne my peopleâ€™s pain. I have wept for love of them. They turn away. I will break their hearts of stone, give them hearts for love alone. I will speak My word to them. Whom shall I send?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here I am, Lord. Is it I, Lord? I have heard You calling in the night. I will go, Lord, if You lead me. I will hold Your people in my heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I, the Lord of wind and flame, I will tend the poor and lame. I will set a feast for them. My hand will save. Finest bread I will provide till their hearts be satisfied. I will give my life to them. Whom shall I send?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
